summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of NEW AdvancedStockChart features: RSI(14) indicator with oversold/overbought zones, MACD(12,26,9) with signal line and histogram, candlestick pattern recognition, and reliable 5-second polling for real-time updates. All requested features working perfectly across multiple stocks (RELIANCE, TCS).
passed_tests: Real-time price updates working via 5-second polling (more reliable than WebSocket)
LIVE status indicator shows green dot with 'LIVE' text when connected
RSI indicator panel displays RSI(14) with cyan line and reference lines at 30/70
RSI badge shows current RSI value and status (Oversold/Overbought/Neutral) in header
MACD indicator panel shows MACD line (green), Signal line (red), and histogram (purple)
MACD (12, 26, 9) label clearly visible above MACD panel
RSI toggle button works perfectly (cyan when active)
MACD toggle button works perfectly (cyan when active)
Patterns toggle button works perfectly (amber when active)
All indicators (RSI, MACD, Signal) show in footer legend with color coding
Price updates automatically every 5 seconds without manual refresh
Chart tooltip shows RSI and MACD values when indicators are enabled
RSI correctly shows Oversold (RELIANCE: 11.7) and Neutral (TCS: 50.4) status
MACD values display correctly in tooltip (RELIANCE: 160.54, TCS: 260.94)
Candlestick pattern detection working (Strong Bearish patterns detected)
All features work consistently across different stocks (RELIANCE, TCS)
Toggle buttons have proper visual feedback (color changes when active)
Reference lines at RSI 30/70 levels visible as dotted lines
MACD histogram displays as purple bars with proper scaling
Real-time status maintained throughout testing session
